title: Elemental Workshop I/Quick guide
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Elemental Workshop I/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Seers' Village, the house south-west of the bank.
Official difficultyNovice
DescriptionHundreds of years ago, a mineral was found that had the ability to change the property of Magic. The magicians, fearing the effect this may have on their profession, sealed this Workshop forever; or so they had hoped. See if you can rediscover the lost knowledge of elemental ore.
Official lengthShort
Requirements
  • 20 Mining (boostable)[t 1]
  • 20 Smithing (boostable)
  • 20 Crafting (boostable)
Items required
  • Knife or a non-poisoned slash weapon (e.g. dagger or scimitar)
  • Pickaxe
  • Needle (obtainable during the quest)
  • Thread
  • Leather (obtainable during the quest)
  • Hammer
  • 4 coal (4 more for each additional bar you would like to produce)
Recommended
  • 15 Combat level
  • Camelot teleport
  • Combat equipment for lower levels
Enemies to defeat
  • Earth elemental (level 35)
Ironman concerns
  • 30 Mining (boostable) (if mining the coal)

See if you can rediscover the lost knowledge of elemental ore.","difficulty":"Novice","kills":"* [[Earth elemental]] ''(level 35)''","name":"Elemental Workshop I/Quick guide","start":"[[Seers' Village]], the house south-west of the bank.","length":"Short","ironman":"* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Mining\" data-level=\"30\">[[File:Mining icon.png|21x21px|link=Mining|alt=Mining]] 30 [[Mining]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup> (if mining the coal)","items":"* [[Knife]] or a non-poisoned [[slash weapon]] (e.g. [[dagger]] or [[scimitar]])\n* [[Pickaxe]]\n* [[Needle]] (obtainable during the quest)\n* [[Thread]]\n* [[Leather]] (obtainable during the quest)\n* [[Hammer]]\n* 4 [[coal]] (4 more for each additional bar you would like to produce)"}
  1. ↑ This requirement can be bypassed if another player mines the rock.

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Getting Started[edit | edit source]

  • In Seers' Village, go to the house immediately south of the anvil.
  • Search the bookcases on the eastern wall to find a battered book.
  • Read the book, then use a knife on it to get a Battered key.
    • Note: You'll need the book later, so don't get rid of it.
  • Go to the building with anvil and open the Odd looking wall in the north (with the key in inventory).
  • Go down the stairs.

Repairing the Workshop[edit | edit source]

  • Go into the room to the north.
  • Turn the water controls east of the water wheel.
  • Turn the water controls west of the water wheel.
  • Pull the lever by the water wheel.
  • (Optional) Kill one of each of the Elemental to complete Kandarin Easy Task. For the Earth Elemental, you must defeat one of the actual Elementals walking around; the rock that turns into the Elemental won't count towards the requirement.
  • (Optional) To obtain Leather, search a crate north of the staircase in the middle room.
  • (Optional) To obtain a Needle, search the two stacked crates on the left as you enter the west room.
  • Go to the eastern room.
  • With a needle, thread, and leather, fix the bellows.
  • Pull the lever by the bellows.
  • Go to the middle room and search the small boxes in the northeast to get a stone bowl.
  • Go to the south room.
  • Use a stone bowl on the lava trough to the south.
  • Use the bowl of lava on the Furnace in the room.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

  • Go to the western room and mine an elemental rock.
  • Kill the Earth elemental and pick up the elemental ore it drops (get 2 more ores if you are planning to do Elemental Workshop II).
  • Use the elemental ore and four coal on the furnace in the southern room. You will get an Elemental metal.
  • With the slashed book, go to the middle room and smith an elemental shield by using the elemental metal on the workbench.

Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 5,000 Crafting experience
  • 5,000 Smithing experience
  • Access to the Elemental Workshop
  • An elemental shield, as well as the ability to make and wield them.

Required for Completing[edit | edit source]

Completion of Elemental Workshop I is required for the following:

  • Elemental Workshop II (Quick guide)
  • An easy and medium task in the Kandarin Diary
    Note: You may want to defeat one of each of the four Elementals for a Kandarin Diary requirement. For the Earth Elemental, you must defeat one of the actual Elementals walking around; the rock that turns into the Elemental won't count towards the requirement.
v • d • e

  • Air elemental
  • Fire elemental
  • Water elemental
Items

  • Slashed book
  • Battered key
  • Elemental ore
  • A stone bowl
  • A stone bowl (full)
  • Elemental metal
  • Elemental shield
  • Rock
Locations and scenery
  • Elemental Workshop
  • Odd looking wall
  • Water controls
  • Water wheel
  • Bellows
  • Lava trough
  • Furnace
  • Workbench
Music
  • Twilight
Related
  • Quick Guide
  • Elemental Workshop II

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Elemental Workshop I}}
{{Reflist|group=t}}

==Walkthrough==
===Getting Started===
{{Checklist|
*In [[Seers' Village]], go to the house immediately south of the anvil.
*Search the bookcases on the eastern wall to find a [[battered book]].
*Read the book, then use a [[knife]] on it to get a [[Battered key]].
**'''Note:''' You'll need the book later, so don't get rid of it.
*Go to the building with anvil and open the Odd looking wall in the north (with the key in inventory).
*Go down the stairs.
}}

===Repairing the Workshop===
{{Checklist|
*Go into the room to the north.
*Turn the water controls east of the water wheel.
*Turn the water controls west of the water wheel.
*Pull the lever by the water wheel.
*(Optional) Kill one of each of the Elemental to complete Kandarin Easy Task. For the Earth Elemental, you must defeat one of the actual Elementals walking around; the rock that turns into the Elemental won't count towards the requirement.
*(Optional) To obtain [[Leather]], search a crate north of the staircase in the middle room.
*(Optional) To obtain a [[Needle]], search the two stacked crates on the left as you enter the west room.
*Go to the eastern room.
*With a [[needle]], [[thread]], and [[leather]], fix the bellows.
*Pull the lever by the bellows.
*Go to the middle room and search the small boxes in the northeast to get [[a stone bowl]].
*Go to the south room.
*Use a stone bowl on the lava trough to the south.
*Use the bowl of lava on the [[Furnace]] in the room.
}}

===Finishing up===
{{Checklist|
*Go to the western room and mine an [[elemental rock]].
*Kill the [[Earth elemental]] and pick up the [[elemental ore]] it drops (get 2 more ores if you are planning to do [[Elemental Workshop II/Quick guide|Elemental Workshop II]]).
*Use the elemental ore and four [[coal]] on the furnace in the southern room. You will get an [[Elemental metal]].
*With the [[slashed book]], go to the middle room and smith an [[elemental shield]] by using the [[Elemental Bar|elemental metal]] on the workbench.
}}

Quest complete!

==Rewards==
{{Quest rewards page|Elemental Workshop I}}

==Required for Completing==
Completion of Elemental Workshop I is required for the following:

*[[Elemental Workshop II]] [[Elemental Workshop II/Quick guide|(Quick guide)]]

*An easy and medium task in the [[Kandarin Diary]]<dl><dd>'''Note:''' You may want to defeat one of each of the four Elementals for a Kandarin Diary requirement. For the Earth Elemental, you must defeat one of the actual Elementals walking around; the rock that turns into the Elemental won't count towards the requirement.</dd></dl>
